example.eg: The yeast makes the bread expand.
example.egtrans: 酵母让面包膨胀了起来。

example.eg: The company has been expanding the last few years.
example.egtrans: 在过去的几年里，公司一直在扩张。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扩大, 扩张, 扩展

dsense.name: expand [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (internet headings: open to reveal text) (菜单等)

example.eg: Right-click to see the option to expand all headings.
example.egtrans: 右键点击即可看到展开所有标题的选项。

example.eg: The forest expanded across the floor of the valley.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 延伸, 展开, 伸展

example.eg: Can you expand on your earlier comments?
You need to expand your notes into full sentences.
